page.title: 09SPORTING SURVEY:2
page.content:
put football as their {second} favourite sort! The same is true in reverse for tennis, with girls choosing it as their favourite sport, and boys choosing it as their{second}favoutite sport. The following are two lists, one for boys and one for girls, again showing the sports in declining order of popularity:-
{BOYS GIRLS} football tennis cricket athletics swimming hockey athletics swimming others others
Having determined the favourite sports, we then asked of people preferred to participate alone or as
